channel.title: Amazon Q on Beachgeek blog - a refuge for pineapple on pizza lovers
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon Q on Beachgeek blog - a refuge for pineapple on pizza lovers

item.title: Writing simple Python scripts faster with Amazon Q
item.description: The future is here folks! I share my experiences using Amazon Q in the IDE, and how I was able to write more quickly and with less friction. Some of you might be familiar with the AWS open source newsletter, a weekly publication that features a curated set of content for open source developers on AWS. I rely on a number of folk to share with me interesting open source projects that I feature, but I wanted to see if I could create an automated script that I could run on a weekly schedule that would find new open source projects for me to review.
